text: [Chapter 12a] [Bipole Sea, Bipole Sea]

speaker: left
text: I think I see someone.
(A small boat passes by Proton's ship)

speaker: left
text: Hello.
???: Hello.

speaker: left
text: Repins, is that you?

speaker: right
text: Wodahs? What are you doing here?

speaker: left
text: Hunting after the Itucher.

speaker: right
text: I'm coming back from Altar, someone's already taken the Itucher.

speaker: left
text: I've went to Altar as well, but we know where the Itucher's been moved to.

speaker: right
text: You do!?

speaker: left
text: You could come with us if you'd like, since you've always been obsessed with finding the Itucher and all.

speaker: left
text: Also, the King of Static will pay all of us who help retrieve it.

speaker: right
text: Are you serious!?

speaker: right
text: PLEASE ALLOW ME TO HELP YOU RETRIEVE THE HOLY ITUCHER!!!
[Recruit Repins] (Q) Recruit (W) Do not recruit

speaker: right
text: I've... I've waited so long for this..

speaker: right
text: THANK YOU! THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!
[Repins has joined your party]

speaker: left
text: There are some enemies approaching, prepare for battle!
[Bonus Conversation Unlocked]

speaker: left
text: Hey Repins.

speaker: right
text: Hey.

speaker: left
text: How long's it been since the academy?

speaker: right
text: About 2 years.

speaker: left
text: Dang, time really flies.

speaker: right
text: Anything happend back at Static?

speaker: left
text: I was actually able to become a member of the Elemental Offense Squad.

speaker: left
text: Suprisingly, they're pretty chill.

speaker: left
text: I mostly do solo missions though, so I don't really get to hang out much.

speaker: right
text: Anything I should know about them?

speaker: left
text: Hmm...

speaker: left
text: Lacirtcele thinks he's cool, he's not.

speaker: left
text: Fael is boring, all he ever talks about is archery and work.

speaker: left
text: Erif is also boring, all she every talks about is the Quad Genocide and her dead family.

speaker: left
text: And there's some generic-looking guy who I haven't even bothered talking to.

speaker: left
text: There's probably a few more that I've forgotten but haven't actually met all of them yet.

speaker: left
text: As for other people here, Proton is pretty chill.

speaker: left
text: Quest is boring and only ever talks about finding the Holy Itucher, kind of like you used to.

speaker: left
text: I am genuienly terrified by Scien.

speaker: left
text: Romra exists.

speaker: left
text: Damagein is crazy, stay away from him.

speaker: left
text: Healia is Sine noble, or something. I'd like to see her say that to Erif.

speaker: left
text: Bladen is sus, I don't trust him.

speaker: left
text: And of course, there's me.

speaker: left
text: I'm epic.
[Wodahs and Repins leveled up!]
